text: The Valakiya Koli (also spelled as Valakia Koli, Valankiya Koli and Valakya Koli) is a clan (Gotra) of the Koli caste mostly found in the Indian state of Gujarat and Union territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu. Valakiya Kolis were pirates by profession and ruled over Valak village of Surat. == Origin == The Valakiya Kolis got their name from the Valak village in Kamrej tehsil of Surat district in Gujarat. They ruled over Valak village and were noted pirates by profession. == Related pages == *Gujarati people == References == Category:Gujarati people
title: Valakiya Kolis
